feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain mixed with snow near midnight then to flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
